Client

Collaboration diagram for Client:

These are all BigWorld modules used only by the client or content creation tools. More...


Modules

 GUI System
 This module contains the GUI system.
 bwclient
 This module contains client-side classes like app, EntityPicker, EntityManager, filters, and some interfaces to networking and python.
 Camera
 This module contains various camera systems.
 DirectShow
 This module contains code that implements with DirectShow for streamed video.
 Duplo
 This module includes a number of classes involving particle systems, model attachments, model motors, and other building blocks for manipulating models.
 Input
 This module contains classes that handle control input on the client.
 Moo Rendering Engine
 This module implements a DirectX rendering engine.
 Romp
 This module handles classes for all the graphical effects on the client.
 Sound
 This module contains a basic sound manager which interfaces to python.

Detailed Description

These are all BigWorld modules used only by the client or content creation tools.
